title: Your Personal Penguin
description: I want to be your PERSONAL PENGUIN from now on!Your Personal Penguin is an irrepressible, read-aloud, listen-along favorite for young children and the grown-ups who read to them. Fun to hold, the book tells the story of a slightly bewildered hippo and the loyal penguin who wants nothing more than to be his Now, lots of other penguins seem to be finein a universe of nothing but ice.But if I could be yours, and you could be mine,Our cozy little world would be twice as nice.I want to be Your Personal Penguin.The original song "Your Personal Penguin," sung by Davy Jones of The Monkees, is available for download.
author: Sandra Boynton
